title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: The first Combo does not take focus when clicked on (Photon).
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:'. 
3. Click on the first Combo. 
Expected result: The focus caret should be in the first Combo.
